item.title: Powershell script to Convert MOV audio files to MP3 using VLC
item.description: So I’ve had a need lately to convert MOV audio files to MP3. At first I searched for self contained solutions online and everything looked and worked like carp-on-a-stick. So here’s what I came up with…use VLC, then I put it in a powershell script. Here’s the commandline for VLC to do the work: vlc -I dummy <INPUTFILE> ":sout=#transcode{acodec=mp3,ab=128,channels=6}:standard{access=file,mux=asf,dst=<OUTPUTFILE>}" vlc://quit Then I just wrapped this around a “gci” on an input folder and viola!
